Description: Glazed composition scarab; pierced longitudinally; engraved elytra and legs and on the base six concentric circles joined by crossing diagonal lines and four circular impressions; large piece missing from head area.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Turner Bequest Excavations, Enkomi
Bibliographic references: Jacobsson 1994 / Aegyptiaca from Late Bronze Age Cyprus (No. 286)
Kenna 1971 / Catalogue of the Cypriote Seals of the Bronze Age in the British Museum (No. 55)
Murray, Smith and Walters 1900 / Excavations in Cyprus (p.21, Pl IV)
